Header: Case against Prasanna Ranatunga and his wife fixed for August 1st
Content: The case filed against Parliamentarian Prasanna Ranatunga and his wife will be taken up for hearing on August 01st. The order was given by the Colombo High Court. Three witnesses in the case were today ordered to appear before court during the next hearing by the High Court.MP Ranatunga and his wife are accused of selling a land in Meethotamulla, Kolonnawa for 64 million rupee to a businessman. The sale is said to have taken place after forcing out some illegal occupants of the land.
